title: Facet-Dependent Oxysulfidation of Cu2O Nanomaterials: Implications for Improving the Efficacy of Nanopesticides
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00545G, Paper
Tingting Du, Wenyu Guan, Zhanhua Zhang, Chuanjia Jiang, Pedro Alvarez, Wei Chen, Tong Zhang
Copper (hydr)oxide nanomaterials are an important class of nanomaterials with various applications, including next-generation pesticides. The efficacy of these materials is largely affected by oxysulfidation, one of the most important...
